Made proofreading orrections and corrected annotation on impeachment, Stevens's speech, Aunt Fanny, and Tecumseh Sherman's St. Louis house, documented Galaxy appearance of O'Connor's Sir Ball and Whitman's receipt of payment for "Whispers of Heavenly Death" from Broadway.
Correct date format in title, update annotations
Annotate O'Connor and his piece in the Galaxy
Annotate Aunt Fanny, piece in English magazine
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
we have lived to see something that never was i suppose known before in america America the impeachment) i think it rather sad but notwithstanding exactly as it should be i suppose the excitement at washington Washington is far greater than here the copperheads here is all for fight that a war will be 25 Feb 68 the result some great politician down town wanted to bet yesterday that the impeachment would not take place so our georgey took him up told him he would bet him that andrew Johnso Andrew Johnson would be impeached in ten hours from that time the gentleman backed down after putting his hand in his pocket to take out his money george came home on sunday Sunday morning very unexpected as i dident didn't look for him till next saturday Saturday he came something about the iron of the pipes he rejected as unfit) i got your letter walter yesterday monday Monday with 5 dollars i was glad to have it walt but i doo do think sometimes you send me more than you can afford and more than i ought to expect but mamma appreciates it if she dont don't make many walt you wrote about your peice piece in an english magazine that you got 50 d in gold its first rate to handle gold in these days but i want
to know what peice piece it was i thought of every one and could not make out what peice piece it was when you write again i wish you would tell me all about it but the gold is quite a new thing to be paid in these days) i think we will get the galaxy and see Oconors peicepiece if its as stupid as his others i dont don't think it will be worth 25 cts cents i dont don't see into his writing such peices pieces as he writes i should think him capable of writing something more substancial substantial a man that can converse as he can

well davis was here last sunday Sunday he gave a good account of the st louis St. Louis folks he says jeff is much better there than here it agrees with him better and he thinks matty will be all right when they get settled he says they all felt the effects of the change of climate its affect is a kind of diarea diarrhea he says he thinks matty will like it better there than here when they get to housekeeping it is in the neighborhood of general Shermans General Sherman's house that was presented to him) and a nice sckool school near he davis looks very well indeed says he is very glad he went out there that he and Jeff has worked very hard but have got through the worst of it aint ain't it been cold Walt i gess guess it has been stinging here but its it's quite moderate to day) i have heard nothing from aunt fanny i suppos suppose she is living yet) the last speech of stephensStevens that was read before the impeachment was good very indeed)

postscript.p: i am pretty well good bye walt dear
